The Kraken.

Danny Disillusioned by Disasterous Daring Do.

And peace rained through out the solar system.
The Peace Piece
Uses the power of kraken to conjure a new hill into existence called kraken hill

The Kraken is purchased and boiled.

Kraken Soup Lake

The soup breaks physics.

Kraken attack soup lake.

Can't have soup without crackers.

Kraken Snack Attack Soup Lake

Customer: Waiter, there is cracked up Kraken in my soup, right next to.

**MY HILL.**

The cabbage and the tomatoes have growm at the krakensoup lake coastline.

Krakenborscht Lake

Microsoft.

**BILL GATES' HILL!**
Extracts the kraken juice from the kraken soup and uses it to make a super-weapon and fires it on bill gates hill

Gates eats all the juice and burps out a new hill.

Burp Hill.

p and H are for acidity (pH).

Bur pH ill

Hit 7

Neutral Hill.
White Flag Hill
Black Flag Hotel on White Flag Hill.
